official_title: Honoring Bishop Noel Jones for his 17 years of service to the City of Refuge Church.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Honors Bishop Noel Jones on the occasion of his 17th pastoral anniversary and his philanthropy, service, and social justice efforts in Los Angeles, California.

titles.title: Honoring Bishop Noel Jones for his 17 years of service to the City of Refuge Church.
